item.title: Activate/deactivate debug mode.
item.description: I start debug mode # This step temporarily turns on debugging mode inside scenario. You can think of it as setting environment variable GODOG_DEBUG to true for a while. Example: Given I start debug mode I stop debug mode # This step turns off debugging mode in given scenario. Example: Given I stop debug mode

item.title: Print last response body.
item.description: I print last response body # This step simply prints to console last HTTP(s) response body. Example: Given I print last response body

item.title: Print scenario cache data.
item.description: I print cache data # This step simply prints current scenario cache data to console. Example: Given I print cache data
